Description: For your consideration is a new other (b-stock) B.C. Rich MK7 Warlock electric guitar. We purchased a bunch of b-stock guitars from B.C. Rich, most of them have very slight, minor finish flaws...but nothing detrimental. This one has a slight ding on the back of the headstock, as well as a slight crack near the neck/body joint. The crack does appear to be cosmetic. The B.C. Warlock Set Neck with Floyd Rose Electric Guitar is a gorgeous rocker you can take to the top, and never look back. It features a highly flamed maple overlay on the Mk7 Warlock “reverse” headstock, smooth “heel-less” neck joint, diamond fretboard inlays, and a bound flamed maple body that all scream classic B.C. Rich. This model sports dual high-output humbuckers with coil-tapping and a Floyd Rose Special tremolo bridge for high-performance fun.
